titles: The Kings bath Affording many sweet and comfortable obseruations from the baptisme of Christ. Gathered by Thomas Taylor, preacher of the word of God at Redding in Barkshire.
author: Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.
publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Thomas Man, and Iohn Bartlet, and are to be sold at the signe of the Talbot in Pater-noster Row,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Jesus Christ --  Baptism --  Early works to 1800.
